parts.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
**MEMORANDUM**

**TO:** [Customer Name/Account Holder]
**FROM:** [Your Company Name] Customer Service Department
**DATE:** October 26, 2023
**SUBJECT:** Update Regarding Your Recent Claim - Reference # [Claim ID]

Dear [Customer Name],

This memo is to provide you with an important update regarding your recent claim, Reference # [Claim ID], filed on [Date of Claim], concerning the [brief description of issue, e.g., "billing discrepancy on your September statement" or "service interruption experienced on October 15th"].

We appreciate your patience as our team conducted a thorough investigation into the matter. We have now completed our review and would like to share the findings and the planned adjustment.

**Investigation Results:**
Our investigation has confirmed that [State the finding clearly, e.g., "an incorrect charge of $X.XX was applied to your account on [Date of Charge]" or "the service interruption was indeed caused by an unforeseen system anomaly on our end"]. We have identified the root cause and are taking steps to prevent recurrence.

**Planned Adjustment/Resolution:**
As a direct result of our findings, we have initiated the following adjustment to rectify this issue:
*   A credit of $[Amount] will be applied to your account within [Number] business days and will be reflected on your next billing statement.
*   [OR: We have successfully restored your service as of [Date/Time] and have applied a complimentary service credit of $[Amount] to your account as a token of our apology for the inconvenience.]
*   [OR: We have processed your request, and the refund of $[Amount] will be issued to your original payment method within [Number] business days.]

You will receive a separate confirmation email once this adjustment has been fully processed and is visible on your account.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience or frustration this situation may have caused. We value your business and are committed to ensuring the accuracy and reliability of our services.

Should you have any further questions or require additional clarification, please do not hesitate to contact our Customer Service team directly at [Your Company Phone Number] or by replying to this email.

Thank you for your understanding and continued trust in [Your Company Name].

Sincerely,

The [Your Company Name] Customer Service Team
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
